<?php
require_once '/wordpress/wp-load.php';

// Clear existing posts to start fresh
$posts = get_posts(array(
  'numberposts' => -1,
  'post_type'   => array('post', 'page'),
  'post_status' => 'any',
  'exclude'     => get_option('page_on_front') // Preserve homepage if set
));

foreach ($posts as $post) {
  wp_delete_post($post->ID, true);
}

// Clear any existing QSM quizzes if needed
global $wpdb;
$quiz_table = $wpdb->prefix . 'mlw_quizzes';

// Check if the table exists before attempting to clear it
$table_exists = $wpdb->get_var("SHOW TABLES LIKE '$quiz_table'");
if ($table_exists) {
  // Only delete quizzes that aren't system quizzes (system = 0)
  $wpdb->query("UPDATE $quiz_table SET deleted = 1 WHERE system = 0");
  
  // Also clear related question data
  $question_table = $wpdb->prefix . 'mlw_questions';
  if ($wpdb->get_var("SHOW TABLES LIKE '$question_table'")) {
    $wpdb->query("UPDATE $question_table SET deleted = 1");
  }
  
  // Clear results if they exist
  $results_table = $wpdb->prefix . 'mlw_results';
  if ($wpdb->get_var("SHOW TABLES LIKE '$results_table'")) {
    $wpdb->query("TRUNCATE TABLE $results_table");
  }
}
